# Inflict Serious Wounds (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 301

This spell functions like *[[Inflict Light Wounds (Spell)|inflict light wounds]]*, except that you deal 3d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +15).
